channel.title: Purbanchal Directory - Recently Added Listings - Montessori

item.title: Kids Village
item.description: Kids Village, the first time in Biratnagar, is scientifically designed pre school with a real Montessori concept established in 2070 B.S. There has been a gap between the prospective children and good quality pre school education in Biratnagar. A team of academicians therefore, wants to use its expertise to fill up the deficit of motherly treatment behaviour in theory and practice by providing good education at pre school level.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: KinderPillar
item.description: Kinder Pillar Ivy league is the first American-Format preschool in Itahari. We provide world class ambiance with modern facilities. Safe and secure environment with CCTV camera in each classrooms with hygienic fooding facility ,Attractive play areas with the teacher child ratio 1:10, kinder smart class, Splash pool, Toy library, Karate classes, French language classes, Own school bus, Day care Facility.
item.dc:creator: jeena
